name: Jack the Barbarian
description:
Jack the Barbarian is an Old-School RPG game. Farming, crafting, combat, fishing, just explore it!
Barbarians, elves, pirates... Who do you think will win?Features
  • Mini RPG Survival game!
  • You can loot items!
  • Craft new weapons!
  • Manage the basic farm system!
  • Buy new weapons and armors!
  • Fight with elves, monsters and pirates!
  • You can fish!
  • You can cook!
  • You can be a miner!
  • Turn Based Combat System!
  • Sail your own boat!

Explore the village, discover secret places...
